Comment: I made it one paragraph before laughing myself out of my chair at this idiotic opinion piece.  >Canada’s new Prime Minister Mark Carney is not your average political leader. He didn’t rise through the ranks of parliament or build his political clout through years of constituency work. He is an unelected central banker turned international power broker with deep ties to the World Economic Forum, the Great Reset movement and the ESG (Environmental, social and governance) agenda.    Lmfao. "Unelected."  He was literally elected party leader and MP of Nepean.  Perhaps the author needs to learn how Canada figures out who becomes the prime minister.  It's the leader of the party that wins the federal election.  What a two bit propagandist.   It then goes on with "Great Reset" conspiracy theories.  How he's going to start a CBDCs to track everyone is in there.  How he's going to somehow end the hegemony of the dollar as if Trump isn't working to do that on his own right now.  How "the globalists" are coming for everyone.  Typical insane far right fan fiction shit.  The degree of stupidity and conspiracy theory thinking is astounding.  This is actually published somewhere.  These people really do live in an alternate universe.
Author: TriflingHotDogVendor
